SEARCH
Package org.example

Class TextProcessor

java.lang.Object
org.example.TextProcessor
public class TextProcessor extends Object
A class containing methods to process a structured Text object. This class performs non-destructive operations on the text by manipulating its component objects.

  • Constructor Details

    • TextProcessor

      public TextProcessor()

  • Method Details

    • replaceWordsOfLength

      public Text replaceWordsOfLength(Text text, int length, Word replacement)
      Replaces all words of a specified length in a Text object with a given replacement word. This method orchestrates the validation and processing, returning a new Text object.
      Parameters:
      text - The input Text object to process.
      length - The length of words to be replaced.
      replacement - The Word to use as a replacement.
      Returns:
      A new Text object with the specified words replaced.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any of the inputs are invalid.

    • processSentence

      private Sentence processSentence(Sentence sentence, int length, Word replacement)
      Processes a single sentence, creating a new sentence with words of the specified length replaced.
      Parameters:
      sentence - The original sentence to process.
      length - The target length of words to replace.
      replacement - The word to use as a replacement.
      Returns:
      A new Sentence object with the transformations applied.

    • processElement

      private SentenceElement processElement(SentenceElement element, int length, Word replacement)
      Processes a single element from a sentence. If the element is a Word of the target length, it returns the replacement. Otherwise, it returns the original element.
      Parameters:
      element - The sentence element to process.
      length - The target length for replacement.
      replacement - The replacement word.
      Returns:
      The original or replacement SentenceElement.

    • validateInputs

      private void validateInputs(Text text, int length, Word replacement)
      Validates the inputs for the word replacement operation.
      Parameters:
      text - The Text object.
      length - The target word length.
      replacement - The replacement Word.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if text or replacement is null, or if length is not positive.
